1.title: Pilot
1.plot: While making a reluctant sale to one of his friends, Mason gets a call from Charlotte who he forgot he was supposed to pick up.

2.title: The Box
2.plot: Charlotte forgets an item in Mason's car that leads to a surprising revelation.

3.title: Father Knows Best
3.plot: Mason meets with Charlotte's no-nonsense father to reveal her secret which results in an even more complicated situation.

4.title: Apoyo
4.plot: The plan for Charlotte's big reveal goes awry as an unexpected complication arises.

imdb.plot outline: Mason Boone and his friends Steve and Sheldon are college students perfectly content with passing their days playing role-playing card games, reading comic books, and discussing the nuances of obscure science fiction movies. Everything changes when Mason meets Charlotte, an attractive young nursing student who shares none of the same interests. Mason falls head over heels and begins his pursuit of Charlotte's affections with reckless abandon as he tries to pass himself off as a regular guy. His deception is short-lived, however, as he implores his unabashedly nerdy friends to help out with the cause and problems arise when Charlotte's overprotective best friend and overbearing father complicate the burgeoning romance. Undaunted by the challenge, Mason, his wacky friends, and Charlotte execute an elaborate and outrageous series of stunts to impress her father and draw the couple closer than ever.
imdb.title: Spaces
plot: With the aid of his quirky friends, Mason Boone attempts a series of outrageous stunts to keep up his story, gain the approval of her family and friends, and win the heart of Charlotte Rothchild.::Dominic Mulvino
